resources.string: Playlist is ready! Press the speaker button to start.
Cannot load playlist. Please check your internet connection and make sure that the playlist still exists on Spotify.
Cannot play current song. Please check your internet connection.
Cannot speak to user. Please make sure your device supports text-to-speech.
Type the name or the Spotify Id of the playlist.
Click the add button to add playlists
Click the search button to browse playlists
Not found or internet is not available
